name: Off the Shelf (turtlegunner)
description:
Arrow keys to move, up arrow to jump!

I didn't really have much time to work on this because I had to deal with an eye infection, so I kinda rushed this in the last 30 minutes. 

The original concept of the game was going to be a platformer in a world where you are a sentient stuffed animal and you can run around in a world that is similar to a bedroom but everything in it is gigantic.

Sorry for rushing this, hope you enjoy! :D
